section.title: Networking Overview
section.para: &PRODUCT; offers two types of networking scenario:

listitem.para: Basic. For AWS-style networking. Provides a single network where guest isolation can be provided through layer-3 means such as security groups (IP address source filtering).
Advanced. For more sophisticated network topologies. This network model provides the most flexibility in defining guest networks.

section.para: For more details, see Network Setup.
